project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program to fetch and display current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse and display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal
Write tests to ensure the API integration and data display work as expected
Execute tests on the weather fetching functionality and data display to confirm accuracy
